name: godbot
updateMsg1: 5.0 Fully rewrote Python crosswordgod functions into JavaScript (go to <#431305701021974539> now to make my effort worth it), and updated to discord.js V13.
updateMsg2: 4.12 Added the >makevote command, and I can now choose singular/plural correctly for some prompts.
updateMsg3: 4.11 Fixed several chatContest bugs and chatCombos now won't reset anymore when the bot restarts.
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
